```{r Data Load}

#Loading Data

plant <- read.csv(here('PLNT21.csv'), stringsAsFactors = TRUE, skip = 1)
gen <- read.csv(here('GEN21.csv'), stringsAsFactors = TRUE, skip = 1)
poverty <- read.csv(here('PovertyEstimates.csv'), stringsAsFactors = TRUE, skip = 4)
unemployment <- read.csv(here('Unemployment.csv'), stringsAsFactors = TRUE, skip = 4)
counties_sf<- st_read(here('cb_2018_us_county_20m.shp')) %>% 
  filter(STATEFP == 37) #Filter for just NC Counties

```

## Data Wrangling

```{r Data Wrangling}

#Filter by North Carolina
Plant_NC <- plant %>% filter(PSTATABB=='NC')
gen_NC <-gen %>% filter(PSTATABB=='NC')

#Create Joined Plot
PowerPlants_DF <-merge(x=gen_NC,y=Plant_NC, by='ORISPL',all.x=TRUE)
```
